title: The Younger Puppy and Melting Dolce - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Cooking   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests
author: 麻日 珱
description: 28 year-old Shizuka Horie loves making sweets. One day, she finds out that the friend she’d made online was the famous actor Kento Watase. Hearing how he can’t go buy the sweets he loves so much without breaking his hard public image, Shizuka suggests she make some for him. And so her relationship starts with the man who turns out to act more like a puppy…>
